entry.title: MC - 16" Window Washer With Plastic Handle Combo - 1 Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 8.99

Keep your windows and other glass surfaces sparkling clean with this window strip washer head and sleeve. This convenient unit includes a durable, lightweight head to increase efficiency and reduce fatigue, allowing your employees to get more done with less effort! Plus, the end of the head is tapered so it can be used as a handle for smaller tasks, and the inside is threaded to accept larger handles for those high, hard-to-reach windows. Additionally, the white sleeve is made of synthetic fiber.
This provides superior water retention and residue removal, ensuring a clean surface every time. Whether you're cleaning your own windows or providing a service for loyal clients, this strip washer is the perfect tool for giving businesses a professional and unblemished appearance.

MC - 16" Window Washer With Plastic Handle Combo - 1 Set -AF06402

entry.title: MC - 32 L Bucket & Wringer Down Press - 1 Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 59.99

MC - 32 L Bucket & Wringer Down Press -1 Set

  • 32L mop bucket and press down wringer combo for cleaning floors or mopping up messes; designed for commercial use
  • High-efficiency side-press wringer works with fan mop holders; down-press wringer works with fan and jaw mop holders; wringers quickly send water back down into bucket
  • Made of durable polypropylene; measurement marks (in 5-quart increments) run up the inside wall of the bucket, smooth-rolling casters for quiet, convenient mobility; bright yellow color for easy visibility and added safety
  • Mop-handle clip-on holder keeps mop upright in bucket; mop not included
  • Explore other sizes available..
